name: Sea Scallops and Shrimp With Champagne Butter Sauce
keywords: main course, sea scallop, shrimp, winter
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds small white mushrooms or wild mushrooms
1 cup dry champagne or white wine
2 1/2 pounds sea scallops, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
2 1/2 pounds medium-size shrimp, shelled and deveined

recipeInstructions.text: Melt 2 tablespoons of the butter in a large skillet (or two skillets, if necessary). Add the mushrooms and salt. Cook over medium heat, stirring, for 2 minutes. Add the shallots and cook briefly. Do not brown. Stir and add the champagne. Keep stirring until the champagne is almost evaporated. Add the cream and bring to a boil, stirring. Reduce to two-thirds over high heat.

Add the scallops and shrimp. Add salt and pepper. Add the Tabasco and bring to a boil over high heat for 3 minutes. Add the lemon juice and stir in the remaining 4 tablespoons butter. Serve immediately.
